name: Forge Dig Forge
description:
Use the Forge to create different tools from different materials.

Different Materials have different properties, like their durability, mining speed etc.

Be sure you have all the parts you need when starting to create a tool, as you will not be able to go back to create more.

The deeper you get the better Materials you will find.

When your Backpack is full or your health is empty you will return to the forge.

Hold LMB to mine(can take up to 10 sec. if you dont have the correct tool) and press ESC to go back to the forge.

I sadly didn't have time to implement the hammer, so it won't do anything.

GLHF and feel free to post your best depth in the comments.
